headlines.description: Newcastle United midfielder Jonjo Shelvey scored a stunning goal to dent Manchester City's title hopes in a 2-2 draw at St James' Park.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City title hopes hit by draw at Newcastle

headlines.description: Crystal Palace ended a winless run of five Premier League games with a 2-0 victory at Burnley on Saturday. Jordan Ayew had an effort disallowed for
headlines.shortLinkText: Palace end winless run with victory at Burnley

headlines.description: Chelsea suffered a shock 1-0 defeat to struggling West Ham United at Stamford Bridge on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: West Ham beat Chelsea, debutant Martin in tears

headlines.description: Liverpool moved 11 points clear at the top of the Premier League after surviving a late scare to beat Brighton 2-1 at Anfield.
headlines.shortLinkText: 10-man Liverpool survive scare to go 11 clear

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur maintained their 100% start under Jose Mourinho with a 3-2 home win over Bournemouth.
headlines.shortLinkText: Spurs beat Bournemouth after another late scare

headlines.description: James Ward-Prowse struck a stunning free kick as Southampton fought back from a goal down to beat fellow strugglers Watford 2-1 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ward-Prowse seals Southampton rally over Watford
